changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.comment: AHS-7886: Remove obsolete DELAY.STATUS and add check constraint
changeSet.sql: UPDATE DELAY SET STATUS = 3 WHERE STATUS IN (4,5,6)
UPDATE DELAY SET STATUS = 0 WHERE STATUS NOT IN (0,1,2,3,7)
ALTER TABLE DELAY ADD CONSTRAINT DELAY_STATUS_CHECK CHECK (STATUS IN (0,1,2,3,7))

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE DELAY DROP CONSTRAINT DELAY_STATUS_CHECK
